mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reserve ( member_id, reserve_date, reserve_time, rcount, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{memberId}, #{rdate}, #{rtime}, #{rCount}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT member_id, reserve_date AS rdate, reserve_time AS rtime, rcount, modify_count FROM reserve WHERE member_id=#{memberId} ORDER BY reserve_date DESC LIMIT 1;
